rubimod:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
rubimod:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

rubimod:MysteriousStranger.NAME: Mysterious Stranger
rubimod:MysteriousStranger.FLAVOR: You feel yourself sniffle less, and your sore throat is gone.

rubimod:SuspiciousSalve.NAME: Suspicious Salve
rubimod:SuspiciousSalve.FLAVOR: This is definitely just juiced animal. Ah well...
DESCRIPTIONS: Artifact has a #b50% chance to stick around.

rubimod:TheologyNotes.NAME: Theology Notes
rubimod:TheologyNotes.FLAVOR: Barely legible, these scraps appear to describe an intense hatred and,, 'Justice.'

rubimod:PrayerBeads.NAME: Prayer Beads
rubimod:PrayerBeads.FLAVOR: Despite how old they must be, the etchings in each bead leave sharp ridges. Better wear them over clothes.
DESCRIPTIONS: rubimod:Sin increases rubimod:Necrotic damage by 15% instead of 10%.

rubimod:PropheticScraps.NAME: Prophetic Scraps
rubimod:PropheticScraps.FLAVOR: Whoever the previous owner of these was, their 'piety' was rather, shall we say, 'Old Testament.'

rubimod:ReaperToken.NAME: Reaper Token
rubimod:ReaperToken.FLAVOR: That isn't meant to be in this world. Whoever put it here likes you. Hopefully.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Artifact at the start of every turn.
